text:
The experience is a wonderful one.
With the staff greeting you even before you step in, they take care of your needs and build a relationship to your experience.
Well done to Jem, Kai and Ahmad.
New place to explore at T3 arrival hall. 4 choices of Tap beers to choose from, IPA to Tiger to Guinness. Happy Hour is definitely worth the calories ü•≥
Excellent service from Ahmad. Especially attentive. Makes small talk and livens up the environment. Ordered the Beef Rendang rice and hae bee hiam. Tasty üëçüèΩ
Nice ambience with good service by Jam and Ahmad. Food is superb and delicious. Worth going

My first time to Shang Cafe and it did not disappoint, I absolutely love it. The Taiwan pork belly rice was devine added to the 1 for 1 deal, I had the prawn cocktail which was excellent too. Will definitely come by again.
Staff Jam was very attentive and made my visit a delightful encounter
